title: Episode 12 - 1948 Election Part II
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary: In this episode we will be examining the Southern reaction to Truman’s Civil rights program, we will look at the Progressive party and what went wrong and why did it fail to attract more Americans? We will also take a closer examination of the Republican party and their primary election
itunes:subtitle: In this episode we will be examining the Southern…
description: In this episode we will be examining the Southern reaction to Truman’s Civil rights program, we will look at the Progressive party and what went wrong and why did it fail to attract more Americans? We will also take a closer examination of the Republican party and their primary election
